name: Get It! (Caku15, Claauvl, raulPernia, Javier Llorente, Rambolis, PoloDeLimon)
name_original: Get It! (Caku15, Claauvl, raulPernia, Javier Llorente, Rambolis, PoloDeLimon)
description:
CHALLENGE YOURSELF IN MINIGAME FUN 

Get It! is a set of quick point-and-click pieces with a focus on light and varied fun. Learn to overcome the six minigames in infinite loops and increase your score until the clock beats you or you make a mistake! 

FEATURES 

- Six different minigames, each with a randomized challenge. 

- Fast-paced fun that challenges you to become increasingly better. 

- Leaderboards that encourage you to beat yourself and your friends. 

CREDITS 

Game made by Ricardo Cancela, Javier Llorente, Jordi Galobardes, Raúl Pernía, Diego Pérez and Claudia Vega.
